SELECT COUNT(*) FROM shop_product

WHERE pro_cate = '패션의류'

WHERE pro_cate = '화장품'

SELECT * FROM (SELECT rownum rnum, B.* FROM ( SELECT pro_no proNo, pro_cate proCate, pro_name proName, pro_price proPrice, pro_detail proDetail, img_no imgNo FROM SHOP_PRODUCT
WHERE 1=1
WHERE pro_cate = '패션의류'
WHERE pro_cate = '생활용품'
WHERE pro_cate = '화장품'
ORDER BY pro_no desc ) B ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startNo } AND #{endNo }
SELECT pro_no proNo, pro_cate proCate, pro_name proName, pro_price proPrice, pro_detail proDetail, img_no imgNo FROM SHOP_PRODUCT WHERE pro_no = #{proNo}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT rownum rnum, T.* FROM ( SELECT A.procom_no procomNO, REPLACE(B.user_Id, SUBSTR(B.user_Id, 4,5),'***') userId, C.pro_no proNO, A.procom_contents procomContents, A.procom_regdate procomRegdate FROM SHOP_PROCOM A, SHOP_USER B, SHOP_PRODUCT C WHERE A.user_id = B.user_id AND A.pro_no = C.pro_no AND A.pro_no = #{proNo} ) T ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startNo } AND #{endNo }
